theme: International Tribunal for the Former Yugoslavia
entities: International Tribunal for the Former Yugoslavia
summary:
The Security Council,
Noting the Secretary-General's letter of 14 September 2005 (S/2005/593),
Decides that, notwithstanding Article 12 of the Statute of the International Tribunal for the Former Yugoslavia and Article 13 bis, Judge Christine Van Den Wyngaert be assigned as a permanent judge to the Mrksic et al. case, commencing on 3 October 2005, although her elected term is to begin on 17 November 2005.
